text: He who observes a particular day, observes it in honor of the 14:6 Lord, while he who abstains from observing a particular day, abstains in honor of the Lord. 92.8% Â¦ Lord. CT 4.8%Lord, while he who abstains from observing a particular day, abstains in honor of the Lord. He who eats, eats in honor of the Lord, for he gives thanks to God, while he who abstains from eating, abstains in honor of the Lord, and he gives thanks to God.
